data.name: SHINRAI - Broken Beyond Despair Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack for the murder mystery visual novel SHINRAI - Broken Beyond Despair.
Contains a total of 29 tracks, adding up to an overall playtime of 1:14:18 hours.
All tracks come in mp3 format at 320 kBit/s.

Tracklist:

1. Oppressive Darkness ~Title~ (2:20)
2. Tranquility of the Conscience (1:04)
3. Carefree Days Drifting by (2:26)
4. Lazy Get-Together (3:08)
5. And Yet, Rays of Hope Shine Down on Us (2:11)
6. Blissful Serenity (3:11)
7. Youthful Spirits Brimming With Energy (2:35)
8. Welcome to My Halloween (2:13)
9. Listen to My Logic (2:44)
10. Eerie Silence (1:47)
11. Nooks and Crannies, Beware! (4:27)
12. Oppressive Darkness ~Creeping~ (2:20)
13. Gruesome Discovery (2:03)
14. Devastation (2:11)
15. Rushing Towards Disaster (2:27)
16. A Blanket of Sadness (3:37)
17. A Pillow of Regret (3:20)
18. Unsettling Suspicions (3:03)
19. Sorrowful Investigation (3:14)
20. Hidden Fragments of Truth (3:35)
21. Conviction ~Rush~ (1:07)
22. A Blanket of Sadness ~Confession~ (3:37)
23. Life Goes on (3:29)

Bonus Tracks:

1. Tranquility of the Conscience ~Miko~ (1:04)
2. Oppressive Darkness ~Threatening~ (2:20)
3. Listen to My Logic ~Again~ (2:44)
4. Conviction ~Full~ (2:09)
5. Torment of the Living ~Unused Track~ (3:20)
6. Carefree Gamer ~Rihatsu's Ringtone~ (0:32)
